Room.Name: Rosecrest Street/Islandia Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Rosecrest Street and Islandia Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Rosecrest Street runs north and south, forming the western edge of the great Lyanden Lake. In the center of the lake is a very large island on which the Lyanden Castle is built upon. Islandia Drive runs west from the intersection, into the busy part of town.
